name: Multiplayer Top-down Shooter
description:
I made this game to learn more about Godot's multiplayer api. I also made it for a tutorial series on online multiplayer using Godot which is available on my youtube channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtw0VxRBTPk6lUEWlviRLGA. Quick note: The game is only a prototype as such it does contain some bugs.

How to play:

[w][a][s][d] keys to move 
left mouse btn to shoot

Enter key to open chat
